reviewText:
Wet adventures seems to be a compliation-type DVD with water-oriented scenes (on boats, poolside, bathtub, etc...) packaged together. Bought it because the price was right and because I'd liked some other Danni titles (Hardbodies and International Beauties to name 2). I was surprised that this one was as good if not better than the others because it has a number of sexy beauties and isn't shy about offering fabulous pink spreads.

Ironically, this one starts off w/ a lot of things I hate, including too much talking, too many exteriors (the girls usually get shy on the outside stuff) and too much Danni. But here, she blew me away with 2 opening solo scenes, w/ those amazing jugs on full display, and a willingness to get those legs open early and often. A last, "hidden" solo scene with her in a shower is worth clicking on, as she gets friendly w/ a shower head and we get the fantastic close-up spreads we really love.

Danni also stars with a number of other hot babes (including porn star Dee and personal fav Nikki Nova) in some multi-girl group / lez scenes. The best of these features her and 4 other girls , in a pool-side jacuzzi. Great boobs and bods, and some simulated (but still quite erotic) carpet munching adds some extra spice to the proceedings. Another 3-way w/ Danni on a boat starts off hot w/ nice rear spreads and hot hand action, but kind of fizzles. Three gorgeous, busty blondes washing a car is a can't lose formula, though this one fizzles as well because of too much soap and too little for the girls to do (they don't really 'get together', as we'd like).

Four hotties baring all on a South American shoot (including nice underwater spreads) was cute and worked well, but a lame wet t-shirt bit and some in-pool filler celebrating her "billionth download" could have been cut (nice butt-shots and spanking but too much talking). Also, not enough really busty babes or true drop dead stunners.

Ultimately, this one didn't blow me away, but got my motor running. Check it out, particularly is you're into water stuff, exteriors or busty solos (Danni may have the best t*ts in the business).

I love these Danni Ashe DVDs! Danni herself is gorgeous, is super stacked, and always seems to be having great fun titillating us, so any DVD she's on has a great asset going for it right from the start. Yet there's a bunch more bodacious ladies on here too, including Erica Campbell and Sydney Moon. The ladies are very affectionate, constantly caressing and massaging each other. Most often they're being playful with each other, with a few scenes more intense but at times those appear to be too much pretend. And usually the ladies are nude or at least topless. They've got a good variety of wet adventures going too, such as partying in a hot tub, stripping while washing a car, giving each other a bath, getting frisky in a swimming pool - you get the picture. The camerawork is usually very good and well-planned, and the picture is sharp. The DVD ends too soon after about one hour and with no extras, but then I could watch these sexy ladies all day long. This is one of my favorite DVDs!
